The new Neo Beast Wars RPG site is officially UP! *round of applause*

Yup, and its posted on my server and everything, so it'll be easier 
for me to update and stuff. However, I do need EVERYONE to resubmit 
the char profiles AS SOON AS POSSIBLE! I won't put any chars that 
don't have profiles up on the members and characters list, and I'll 
continue bugging people untill they submit them.

Anyways, the new site is at (drumroll) http://nbwrpg.com or 
www.nbwrpg.com! Check it out (this isn't optional, its mandatory), 
and submit your chars! I hope it looks cooler than the last one, 
cause I've been working on it for a while.

The links and message board arn't up because the CGI scripts arn't 
ready yet, and the members and chars pages arn't up because I need 
people to submit their chars for that. So the sooner everyone submits 
chars, the sooner the site will be complete!

Some info for filling out the join form:

1. Be sure to include the @... in your email. Some 
poeple forget that, and the new script won't accept applications 
without a proper email adress.

2. For alliegence, please don't put "Brooder's Group" (just an 
example) or something, put the official name of your team (Chosen 
Ones, BrootherHood, etc..). If your bot's team doesn't have an 
official name, put Neutral.

3. MAKE SURE EVERYTHING IS CORRECT BEFORE SUBMITTING! For changes to 
your profile, you'll have to ask me to delete it and then you'll have 
to resubmit it. I'll make a validation page later, but for now be 
absolutely sure that this is how you want your bot's profile to look 
before submitting.

4. Prepare for Yanshosh taking over the world. Err.... You wern't 
supposed to hear that, forget I typed it!

Allrighty, there. The reason I've been posting less than usual is 
cause I've been working on the site, and probably will be considering 
I'll hopefully get flooded with char submissions.

I'll leave you all alone to submit your chars now.
